events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and I would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect product received by the customer.
Hello! I'm Emily from customer support. I understand you want a refund for your recent order. I'm here to help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the mistake?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached the photo showing that I received a completely different item from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days. You do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for your quick response and the refund offer, I appreciate you not making me return the wrong product.
Your refund has been initiated and should reflect in your account shortly. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Since the refund has been successfully processed and confirmed, we are closing this support case now. Thank you for reaching out.
